titleStmt.title: A discourse touching the pretended match betwene the Duke of Norfolke and the Queene of Scottes
titleStmt.author: Norton, Thomas, 1532-1584, attributed name.
Sampson, Thomas, 1517?-1589, attributed name.
Walsingham, Francis, Sir, 1530?-1590, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Norton, to Thomas Sampson, or to Sir Francis Walsingham.
In this edition the text begins "For as muche" in italic.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
